name: Discoraux
description:
Made in 48h for the digital art Jam

Play using your mouse, it's the only control you have

  • You diffuse hot or cold water around you, it switch automatically from one to another. 
  • Blue corals prefer cold, red ones prefer it warm.
  • Fishes disturb the deap sea peace. Manta ray diffuse cold water and red fishes diffuse hot water

Don't let corals loose their shine and colors (even if their is no fail state at the moment)

By Garance Royere (art), Géraud de Courrèges (code and design), Antoine Druaux (music)
